text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet observation-vitalsign-headcircum

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where CLASS = BDYCRC.MOLEC, COMPONENT = LP72254-3 (Circumference.occipital-frontal), PROPERTY = LP6822-3 (Len), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt), SYSTEM = LP7281-1 (Head) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)
  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where CLASS = BDYCRC.MOLEC, COMPONENT = LP304462-7 (Circumference.occipital-frontal^at birth), PROPERTY = LP6822-3 (Len), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt), SYSTEM = LP7281-1 (Head) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)

name: VitalSignsHeadCircum
title: Vital Signs - Head Circumference
description: This value set defines the set of LOINC codes considered to be appropriate for representing head circumference vital sign measurements in Observation.code.
